0.speaker: Me
0.text: I woke up, as if from a bad dream, alert and restless.

1.speaker: Me
1.text: I realized very quickly with the way the sun was shining through the window that I had overslept.

2.speaker: Me
2.text: I grabbed my phone at my bedside and groaned as I realized it must have run out of battery overnight.

3.speaker: Me
3.text: I quickly inserted my phone into the nearby charger and made my way to the bathroom to rinse my face.

4.speaker: Me
4.text: There wouldn't be any time to prepare anything else and if I was going to show my face at work, then at least my face should look halfway presentable.

5.speaker: Me
5.text: 'Alice?' I called out instinctively, but then stopped myself from going further.

6.speaker: Me
6.text: How could I have forgotten? She hasn't been here for over a week.

7.speaker: Me
7.text: Desperation does a thing to the mind.
